data.user_prompt: (Target: desktop) Design a sleek mobile dashboard for a personal finance app aimed at young professionals. Use a clean, high-contrast light theme with a white background, deep navy for headers, and soft green accents for positive values. Typography should be geometric sans-serif (e.g., Inter or Nunito) with clear hierarchy and generous line spacing. Keep cards with subtle shadows and 16px rounded corners, using iconography that’s minimal and line-based. Layout should be airy with consistent 16px padding, and data visualizations should be flat and uncluttered — inspired by Revolut and Stripe’s mobile UI.

data.user_prompt: (Target: desktop) Create a smooth, friendly onboarding experience for a telehealth platform. It should guide new doctors through setting up their profile, uploading credentials, and connecting with patients. Include progress indicators, simple form layouts, and reassuring microcopy. The design should feel very light and with a lot of whitespace. Very rounded and approachable. Use pastel colors but high contrast UI elements for accessibility. Main color mint green.

data.user_prompt: (Target: mobile) Product Requirement: Fitness Mobile App – Workout Tracker Screen. Purpose: To allow users to log workouts, track progress, and stay motivated. UI Components: Header: App logo, date selector, and user profile icon. Workout Summary: Daily stats (calories burned, duration, workouts completed). Exercise List: Each with image thumbnail, name, sets/reps, and completion checkbox. Progress Chart: Weekly activity visualization. Bottom Nav: Home, Workouts, Progress, Settings. Visual Style: Theme: Dark mode with vibrant accents. Primary color: Purple #6A0DAD. Accent color: Neon Green #39FF14. Supporting color: Charcoal #1C1C1C. Spacing: 16px section padding, 8px between list items. Borders: None, use glowing shadow for active elements. Typography: Bold sans-serif for headings (18px), regular for details (14px).

data.user_prompt: (Target: desktop) Product Requirement: SaaS Project Management – Kanban Board. Purpose: To help teams visualize tasks, track progress, and collaborate efficiently in real-time. UI Components: Header: Product logo, team/project selector, and quick-add task button. Board View: Drag-and-drop task cards organized into columns (To Do, In Progress, Done). Task Cards: Title, assignee avatar, due date, and priority tag. Filters & Search: Quick filters for status, assignee, and labels. Footer: Project activity log and storage usage indicator. Visual Style: Theme: Light mode with optional dark toggle. Primary color: Green #28A745. Accent color: Yellow #FFC107. Supporting color: Gray #F5F5F5. Spacing: 12px inner padding, 20px column gap. Borders: 1px solid #E0E0E0 for columns, straight corners on cards.

data.user_prompt: (Target: mobile) Product Requirement: Mindfulness App – Meditation Session Screen. Purpose: Provide a calming, immersive environment for meditation guidance. UI Components: Full-screen background: Soft animated gradient that slowly shifts colors. Centerpiece: Session timer in large, airy type. Controls: Minimal icons for play, pause, sound options. Session Notes: Short inspirational quote or theme for the day. Visual Style: Theme: Ultra-minimal, wellness-inspired. Primary color: Soft lavender #B5A1FF. Accent color: Peach #FFC1A1. Supporting color: White #FFFFFF. Borders: None — elements float with soft shadows. Typography: Light sans-serif (Avenir Light) with plenty of letter spacing. Animation: Slow fade transitions and breathing circle animations. Sound UI: Icons styled like thin-line water drops.

data.user_prompt: (Target: desktop) Product Requirement: Luxury Jewelry E-commerce – Product Detail Page. Purpose: Showcase a single high-end product with maximum visual impact to drive purchases. UI Components: Hero: Full-bleed macro shot of jewelry on dark backdrop, with a subtle gradient overlay. But with fixed height. Product Info: Name, price, material details, “Add to Cart” and “Book an Appointment” buttons. Gallery: 4–6 alternative angles in a horizontal scroll with hover zoom. Story Section: Brand history or inspiration behind the piece. Footer: Related products carousel. Visual Style: Theme: Deep, cinematic dark mode. Primary color: Black #000000. Accent color: Gold #D4AF37 (metallic gradient). Supporting color: Warm white #FDF8F4. Borders: Ultra-thin (0.5px) gold lines for separators. Typography: Serif (Playfair Display) for product name, high-contrast modern sans (Helvetica Neue) for details. Imagery: Always high-contrast with dramatic lighting, like luxury watch ads.
